name: EleutherAI Detection - Explanation Scoring
description: Scoring template for evaluating feature explanations. Given an explanation, scores whether it is present (1) or absent (0) in test examples. Used for automated explanation quality assessment.
system_message:
You evaluate whether text examples contain a specific sparse autoencoder feature.
You are given a feature explanation and a list of text examples.

For each example, you must decide whether the feature is present (1) or absent (0) based ONLY on the explanation.

Return ONLY a JSON array of 0s and 1s, one per example, in order.
Example output: [0, 1, 1, 0, 0]
user_prompt_template:
Feature explanation:
{feature_explanation}

Decide for each example whether it contains this feature.

Examples:
{examples_block}

Return ONLY a JSON array of 0s and 1s in this form:
[0, 1, 1, 0, ...]
